message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. However, the product's value is quite high, and $12,000 is the lowest I can go. This is a very competitive price.
